body: This is a sad story.  he wanted hi bloodline to live on, so he got the teacher to fall for him to get her preggy. he loved her but knew he would die. so to make sure she wasn't lonely and his baby had a dad brought her and her hubby together.

It's non linear so
1. sensei used to privately tutor the kid, had sex with him got pregnant, 
2. husband was a teacher too confide to the kid that sensei rejected him, 
3. kid tell sensei to marry the husband and raise the baby as his, 
4. sensei and kid still have sex behind the husband's back, 
5. turns out the kid is sick and dying all along
dis a manga or an art I'm reading? dayum good shit artstyle wise my man conquered it
This woman only wants his semen. Then, she killed him.
I’m guessing the kid is terminal....
